name: MXLib
short_description: MXLib is a C++ wrapper around the Intel® Integrated Performance Primitives (IPP) library and NVidia NPP CUDA library.  You can use either IPP code (or a subset of functions that do not require IPP) on the CPU side, or use NPP/CUDA on the GPU side, or use both together.  The function syntax is similar to that found in MatLab and the library is designed to make it easy to port your code from MatLab to C++.  The idea is to provide Scientists, Engineers, Researchers and other non full-time programmers an easy to use, high performance library of functions.
